cause.description:
Fedor the greatest combat fighter of all time. Ali who?? Foreman who?? Tyson who?? Hitler who??
1. Fedor would demolish the UFC.
2. Fedor would rape any contender.
3. Fedor likes pie.
4. Fedor only listens to death rap and grindcore.
cause.mission: Praise the love of Fedor, or die.
cause.name: The Church of Fedor
